A crisis in missionary effort is upon us. There is a great work to be done, and if this work is earnestly done in Battle 
                                                                           77
Creek, if it is faithfully done throughout the churches in Michigan, if it is vigorously prosecuted in all our older churches and strongholds of influence, we may hope that its influence will leaven the churches throughout all the conferences, many of whom are now standing as if paralyzed.
